named-query.name: BC_READ_MODULE_CONFIG_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT config FROM org.broadleafcommerce.common.config.domain.ModuleConfiguration config WHERE config.configType = :configType

named-query.name: BC_BATCH_UPDATE_MODULE_CONFIG_DEFAULT
named-query.query: UPDATE org.broadleafcommerce.common.config.domain.ModuleConfiguration config SET config.isDefault = false WHERE config.configType = :configType
